page.title: 01INTRODUCTION/GAZETTEER
page.content: Our area covers Capel_le_Ferne,West Hougham,Church Hougham,Satmar and Hockley Sole. A20 ROAD p.3,4 & 8,Campsites p.11. CAPEL_LE_FERNE Camping p.11 & p.15, Church p.2 & p.3,Farming p.6 & p.9, Housing p.8,Normans p.2,Origin p.2, Population p.2,Schools p.5,p.7 & p.10, Satmar Pond p16,Shops and Facilities p.4,Spectacular p.15,Village Hall p.4 & p15,Wild Flowers p.16. CHURCH HOUGHAM School p10 & p.19, IBA/BBC Transmitting Station p.18, St. Laurence's Church p.19 & p.20. DOVER Schools p.5,Holidays p.11, Railway p.12,Port Workers p.17. FOLKESTONE Schools p.5,Holidays p.11,Railway p.12,Port Workers p.17. HOCKLEY SOLE Manor & Arboretum p.14. THE WARREN Camping p11,Railways p.12,Sea Defences p.13. WEST HOUGHAM Facilities p.17.
